mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_mars.game INNER JOIN status ON game.status = status.status_id ORDER BY game.cod;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game (title, status, release_date, price, purchase_date, start_date, finish_date, cover) VALUES (#{title}, #{status.status_id}, #{release_date}, #{price}, #{purchase_date}, #{start_date}, #{finish_date}, #{cover});
